Class Button

extends Object
implements EventListener

        Creates a new button.
        Parameters:
        uvStart - the starting position of the button in UV space.
        uvEnd - the end position of the button in UV space.
        texture - the texture of the button.
        onClick - what happens when the button is clicked.
